text: His anxiety for her comfort — his continual solicitations that she would eat , and his often - expressed fears of her seeing nothing to her taste — though never in her life before had she beheld half such variety on a breakfast - table — made it impossible for her to forget for a moment that she was a visitor .

text: The remembrance of Mr. Allen ’s opinion , respecting young men ’s open carriages , made her blush at the mention of such a plan , and her first thought was to decline it ; but her second was of greater deference for General Tilney ’s judgment ; he could not propose anything improper for her ; and , in the course of a few minutes , she found herself with Henry in the curricle , as happy a being as ever existed . A very short trial convinced her that a curricle was the prettiest equipage in the world ; the chaise and four wheeled off with some grandeur , to be sure , but it was a heavy and troublesome business , and she could not easily forget its having stopped two hours at Petty France .

text: Tilney gently hinted her fear of being late ; and in half a minute they ran downstairs together , in an alarm not wholly unfounded , for General Tilney was pacing the drawing - room , his watch in his hand , and having , on the very instant of their entering , pulled the bell with violence , ordered “ Dinner to be on table _ directly ! _ ” Catherine trembled at the emphasis with which he spoke , and sat pale and breathless , in a most humble mood , concerned for his children , and detesting old chests ; and the General , recovering his politeness as he looked at her , spent the rest of his time in scolding his daughter for so foolishly hurrying her fair friend , who was absolutely out of breath from haste , when there was not the least occasion for hurry in the world : but Catherine could not at all get over the double distress of having involved her friend in a lecture and been a great simpleton herself , till they were happily seated at the dinner - table , when the General ’s complacent smiles , and a good appetite of her own , restored her to peace .

text: The dining - parlour was a noble room , suitable in its dimensions to a much larger drawing - room than the one in common use , and fitted up in a style of luxury and expense which was almost lost on the unpractised eye of Catherine , who saw little more than its spaciousness and the number of their attendants .

text_tokenized: Her heart fluttered , her knees trembled , and her cheeks grew pale .

text: She seized , with an unsteady hand , the precious manuscript , for half a glance sufficed to ascertain written characters ; and while she acknowledged with awful sensations this striking exemplification of what Henry had foretold , resolved instantly to peruse every line before she attempted to rest .
text_tokenized: She seized , with an unsteady hand , the precious manuscript , for half a glance sufficed to ascertain written characters ; and while she acknowledged with awful sensations this striking exemplification of what Henry had foretold , resolved instantly to peruse every line before she attempted to rest .

text: The dimness of the light her candle emitted made her turn to it with alarm ; but there was no danger of its sudden extinction ; it had yet some hours to burn ; and that she might not have any greater difficulty in distinguishing the writing than what its ancient date might occasion , she hastily snuffed it .
text_tokenized: The dimness of the light her candle emitted made her turn to it with alarm ; but there was no danger of its sudden extinction ; it had yet some hours to burn ; and that she might not have any greater difficulty in distinguishing the writing than what its ancient date might occasion , she hastily snuffed it .

text: Alas !
text_tokenized: Alas !

text: it was snuffed and extinguished in one .
text_tokenized: it was snuffed and extinguished in one .

text: A lamp could not have expired with more awful effect .
text_tokenized: A lamp could not have expired with more awful effect .

text: Catherine , for a few moments , was motionless with horror .
text_tokenized: Catherine , for a few moments , was motionless with horror .

text: It was done completely ; not a remnant of light in the wick could give hope to the rekindling breath .
text_tokenized: It was done completely ; not a remnant of light in the wick could give hope to the rekindling breath .

text: Darkness impenetrable and immovable filled the room .
text_tokenized: Darkness impenetrable and immovable filled the room .

text: A violent gust of wind , rising with sudden fury , added fresh horror to the moment .
text_tokenized: A violent gust of wind , rising with sudden fury , added fresh horror to the moment .

text: Catherine trembled from head to foot .
text_tokenized: Catherine trembled from head to foot .

text: In the pause which succeeded , a sound like receding footsteps and the closing of a distant door struck on her affrighted ear .
text_tokenized: In the pause which succeeded , a sound like receding footsteps and the closing of a distant door struck on her affrighted ear .

text: Human nature could support no more .
text_tokenized: Human nature could support no more .

text: A cold sweat stood on her forehead , the manuscript fell from her hand , and groping her way to the bed , she jumped hastily in , and sought some suspension of agony by creeping far underneath the clothes .
text_tokenized: A cold sweat stood on her forehead , the manuscript fell from her hand , and groping her way to the bed , she jumped hastily in , and sought some suspension of agony by creeping far underneath the clothes .

text: To close her eyes in sleep that night , she felt must be entirely out of the question .
text_tokenized: To close her eyes in sleep that night , she felt must be entirely out of the question .

text: With a curiosity so justly awakened , and feelings in every way so agitated , repose must be absolutely impossible .
text_tokenized: With a curiosity so justly awakened , and feelings in every way so agitated , repose must be absolutely impossible .

text: The storm too abroad so dreadful ! she had not been used to feel alarm from wind , but now every blast seemed fraught with awful intelligence .
text_tokenized: The storm too abroad so dreadful ! she had not been used to feel alarm from wind , but now every blast seemed fraught with awful intelligence .

text: The manuscript so wonderfully found , so wonderfully accomplishing the morning ’s prediction , how was it to be accounted for ?
text_tokenized: The manuscript so wonderfully found , so wonderfully accomplishing the morning ’s prediction , how was it to be accounted for ?

text: What could it contain ?
text_tokenized: What could it contain ?

text: To whom could it relate ?
text_tokenized: To whom could it relate ?

text: By what means could it have been so long concealed ?
text_tokenized: By what means could it have been so long concealed ?

text: And how singularly strange that it should fall to her lot to discover it !
text_tokenized: And how singularly strange that it should fall to her lot to discover it !

text: till she had made herself mistress of its contents , however , she could have neither repose nor comfort ; and with the sun ’s first rays she was determined to peruse it .
text_tokenized: till she had made herself mistress of its contents , however , she could have neither repose nor comfort ; and with the sun ’s first rays she was determined to peruse it .

text: But many were the tedious hours which must yet intervene .
text_tokenized: But many were the tedious hours which must yet intervene .

text: She shuddered , tossed about in her bed , and envied every quiet sleeper .
text_tokenized: She shuddered , tossed about in her bed , and envied every quiet sleeper .

text: The storm still raged , and various were the noises , more terrific even than the wind , which struck at intervals on her startled ear .
text_tokenized: The storm still raged , and various were the noises , more terrific even than the wind , which struck at intervals on her startled ear .

text: The very curtains of her bed seemed at one moment in motion , and at another the lock of her door was agitated , as if by the attempt of somebody to enter .
text_tokenized: The very curtains of her bed seemed at one moment in motion , and at another the lock of her door was agitated , as if by the attempt of somebody to enter .

text: Hollow murmurs seemed to creep along the gallery , and more than once her blood was chilled by the sound of distant moans .
text_tokenized: Hollow murmurs seemed to creep along the gallery , and more than once her blood was chilled by the sound of distant moans .

text: Hour after hour passed away , and the wearied Catherine had heard three proclaimed by all the clocks in the house before the tempest subsided or she unknowingly fell fast asleep .
text_tokenized: Hour after hour passed away , and the wearied Catherine had heard three proclaimed by all the clocks in the house before the tempest subsided or she unknowingly fell fast asleep .
